issue.title: [JS] Simplify UTF8 handling in NodeJS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12578](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12578). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Removing Buffer() usage in favor of TextEncoder() API which is standard.

I didn't see any difference in performance (359s vs 360s) and the removal helps with maintenance. See: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8418#issuecomment-827972276>
